message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob! I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with the price you mentioned. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you consider that price?

Hi Bob! I understand you're still looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $108. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $108, so I'll offer $106. Can you consider that price?

Hi Bob! I understand you're still looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $107. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $107, so I'll offer $105. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
